skill.name: code-review
skill.description: Expert code review specialist for quality, security, and maintainability. Use when reviewing code changes, ensuring high development standards, or conducting security audits. Provides actionable feedback organized by priority.
skill.summary: Expert code review specialist for quality, security, and maintainability. Use when reviewing code ch...
skill.author: Joseph OBrien

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown documentation and review guidelines. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or external command execution detected. This is a knowledge-base skill that provides code review instructions and templates.

content.user_title: Review code for quality and security
content.value_statement: Code reviews catch bugs, security vulnerabilities, and maintainability issues before they reach production. This skill provides structured guidance for thorough code reviews with prioritized, actionable feedback.
actual_capabilities: Analyze code changes and identify modifications
Detect security vulnerabilities and exposed secrets
Identify performance issues and optimization opportunities
Check compliance with project conventions and best practices
Provide prioritized feedback organized by severity
limitations: Does not execute code or run tests automatically
Does not access external files or repositories directly
Does not modify code or suggest automated fixes
Relies on user-provided code context for analysis

use_cases.title: Pre-merge code reviews
use_cases.description: Review pull request changes before merging to catch issues early

use_cases.title: Security vulnerability assessment
use_cases.description: Identify exposed secrets, injection risks, and authentication flaws

use_cases.title: Code quality standards enforcement
use_cases.description: Ensure new code meets project conventions and best practices

prompt_templates.title: Basic review request
prompt_templates.prompt: Review the recent code changes in this branch

prompt_templates.title: Security focused review
prompt_templates.prompt: Check this file for security issues and code quality problems

prompt_templates.title: Specific file review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review src/auth.js for security vulnerabilities and maintainability issues

prompt_templates.title: Comprehensive review
prompt_templates.prompt: Conduct a thorough code review of all changes in this pull request. Check for security issues, code quality, performance problems, and best practice violations. Organize findings by severity.

best_practices: Provide specific file paths and line numbers in review requests for focused analysis
Request security review before merging code that handles authentication or sensitive data
Use the checklist format to ensure comprehensive coverage across all review dimensions
anti_patterns: Requesting reviews without providing the actual code or diff to analyze
Ignoring critical security findings and merging vulnerable code
Using the skill without understanding the context or purpose of the code

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It guides the AI to provide structured code review feedback.

faq.question: What types of security issues can it detect?
faq.answer: It identifies hardcoded secrets, SQL injection risks, XSS vulnerabilities, missing authentication checks, and insecure input handling.

faq.question: Does it run tests or execute code?
faq.answer: No, this skill analyzes code structure and patterns. It does not execute code or run automated tests.

faq.question: Is my code sent to external servers?
faq.answer: No, the skill operates entirely within your AI session. Code is processed locally by the AI model.

faq.question: Why are no issues being found in my review?
faq.answer: Ensure you provide the actual code, file paths, or git diff. The skill needs code context to analyze. Try being more specific about what to review.

faq.question: How is this different from automated linting tools?
faq.answer: This skill provides human-like review judgment including design patterns, architecture feedback, and contextual security advice that static tools may miss.
